name: ZombieBoy-Zombie growing game
description:
New title from "ZombieGirl" series, "Zombie Boy"!

Live together with an insane zombie
and raise the creepy creature into a human being
to end up as a happy crazy couple!

Will the zombie regain its intelligence,
or fall into the darkness of insanity again?
